name: SillySums
0:
”Alexa, open silly sums”
”Alexa, ask silly sums for a sum”
”give me a silly sum”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: silly sums
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Have fun and improve your maths skills with silly sums. Perfect for practicing addition, subtraction and division. 

Educational with an element of surprise. Ask Alexa for a silly sum, find out if you’re correct and listen to Alexa say words you’ve never heard before! 

Develop your mental arithmetic at the same time as letting your imagine run wild. 

Includes fun animal sound effects and cute graphics for devices with screens.

Sums have never been so fun!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
